subject: Pedals kit
description_text:
Hello, I bought the kit for the pro plus pedals and I wonder will I get the
red elastomers with it because I didn’t see it on photos

conversations.body_text: Hi Hubert Dupa,    We will double-check tomorrow to confirm whether the red version is included. In theory, it should be part of the sale, as it’s a complete upgrade kit.
Hi Hubert Dupa,  This upgrade kit includes the red dampers. I’ll ask our sales team to update the product images accordingly.
